version_description: We launched our first offering this week! Kehinde Wiley’s “Saint Jerome Hearing the Trumpet of Last Judgement” is now live on the app. This week’s updates include bug fixes and polish.
We have big updates coming your way. We added an in-app browser, the ability to manually add your bank account, as well as polish and bug fixes.

This week, we’ve made improvements across our platform. From bug fixes and style updates to an improved user signup process, we’re constantly iterating to provide our users with the optimal in-app experience.
This week we’ve got optimized images and videos, and other performance improvements for a better in-app experience.
This week we’ve got mostly under the hood updates, including performance upgrades and better error tracking to help debug issues faster.
This week we’ve got a brand new discover tab to make it easier to find your favorite drops, as well as other under the hood upgrades to improve the performance of our app.
This week we’ve addressed a few bugs and made performance improvements to make the app faster and more reliable.
This week we’ve addressed some reported bugs and made other under the hood improvements.
This week we made some under the hood improvements to gear up for some exciting new features in the works.
This week we’re excited to roll out cash accounts on the Otis app! Users will now be allowed to transfer money to and from their Otis account, creating a much a more seamless transaction process.

Move money into your Otis account to purchase drops without waiting for your bank transfer to process. We also addressed some bugs and made internal improvements to gear up for some exciting features coming soon.
This week we addressed some bugs to smoothen out the cash accounts experience. Move money into your Otis account to purchase drops without waiting for your bank transfer to process.
Move money into your Otis account to purchase drops without waiting for your bank transfer to process. This week we have mostly under the hood improvements to gear us up for upcoming features.
This week we made bug fixes and internal improvements.
This week, we've continued to make bug fixes and more under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.
This week brings new under-the-hood improvements to help deliver the optimal in-app experience
